product_overview: A modern marketing website built with React and Express that showcases product features, pricing, and customer testimonials, aimed at converting visitors through engaging design and clear calls to action.
core_goals: Provide an attractive landing page with a strong hero section and clear call-to-action.
Showcase product features and pricing tiers effectively to inform potential customers.
Enable user interaction through FAQ accordions and contact forms with validation.
Offer trust-building elements such as testimonials and partner logos.
Ensure responsive design for a seamless experience across devices.
Implement an API server to support frontend requests and demo capabilities.
key_features: Landing Page Hero section with CTA and marketing messaging.
Pricing Section with multiple tier plans displayed clearly.
Features Section highlighting key product benefits.
FAQ Accordion for common questions with expandable UI.
Contact Form with validation and submission handling.
Newsletter Subscription form for email capture.
Responsive Navigation Menu and Layout for desktop and mobile.
Footer with links and company information.
Express API server with demo and ping endpoints.
UI component library with Radix UI and TailwindCSS for consistent styling.
Form handling utilities with validation using Zod.
Mobile device detection hook for responsive behavior.
Toast notification system for user feedback.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage and first sees the hero section with call-to-action.
User scrolls to view product features, pricing plans, FAQ, testimonials, and partner logos sections.
User interacts with FAQ accordions to get answers to common questions.
User fills out the contact form with validation to send inquiries.
User subscribes to the newsletter via an email form.
Navigation menu enables seamless movement across site sections on desktop and mobile.
User receives toast notifications as feedback for form submissions and interactions.
Backend Express API handles frontend requests for demonstration and ping.
validation_criteria: All UI components render correctly and are responsive across devices.
Forms validate inputs correctly and show errors as needed before submission.
FAQ accordion expands and collapses smoothly without errors.
API endpoints respond correctly to requests and handle errors appropriately.
Toast notifications display timely and disappear as expected.
Landing page loads quickly and displays content in correct order.
Navigation menu functions correctly on desktop and mobile devices.
Newsletter subscriptions capture emails and handle edge cases.
Testimonials carousel cycles through feedback without glitches.
